Description:
Downsize Without Compromise
Located in one of Belmonts best streets, this beautifully updated home will have you falling in love from the moment you walk through the door. A highly desirable location, literally a stroll to Highton Village, High St shops, great schools and the gorgeous Barwon River. As you enter the home youre greeted with high ceilings and quality finishes, the home offers two good sized bedrooms the master with renovated ensuite and large dressing room or nursery while the other bedroom is serviced by the centrally located bathroom. The open kitchen is perfect for the entertainer with easy access to the to the undercover decked alfresco area with outdoor kitchenette, the perfect spot for those family gatherings. The home has hydronic heating throughout, split system A/C in the living area, and off street parking for one car. This stunning home is the perfect opportunity to enter the ever popular suburb of Belmont and would suit a downsizer or young couple.
Insights: 1/12 Hill Street, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 40 other 2 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Great Grovedale Opportunity!
Situated in the heart Grovedale and set on a generous 605m2 (approx) rear north facing block, this spacious home is the perfect option for those looking to enter the ever popular Grovedale market. Close to local parks, shops & schools, sporting fields, Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Deakin University, Epworth Hospital and Marshall train-station this property offers convenience in a desirable location.
A low maintenance garden borders the generous front driveway leading to the large carport with secure remote door. Upon entry the spacious front living area leads through to the open plan dining and kitchen which features great storage, dish washer, gas cook top and new wall oven.
Near the front foyer is the generous master bedroom featuring built-in robes and convenient ensuite. From here a hallway leads to 2 more generous bedrooms both with large built-in robes. Further along the hall is the convenient bathroom with separate toilet a functional laundry with direct access to the rear yard. The north facing rear yard offers plenty of space to extend or renovate and features under-cover pergola and garden shed.
Additional features include, open plan design, gas wall heater, RC AC unit and ceiling fans throughout. If you are looking for a great investment opportunity then look no further than this spacious 3 BR home on a large allotment, offering good storage & plenty of room to grow in the future. This home will definitely impress on first inspection.
Insights: 68 Greenville Drive, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 143 other 3 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
Calling all investors.
This is a great opportunity to secure a no fuss investment property that is currently leased until January 2021 at $340pw with tenants who love the property. Located right in the heart of Highton where pride of ownership is evident throughout the neighbourhood. Step into the large living room with vaulted ceilings, creating that spacious feeling. This flows through to the kitchen/meals area which looks out over the garden.
Two bedrooms, master with walk in robe, bedroom two with built in robe and a central two-way bathroom. The bright kitchen is equipped with a gas oven and a double sink, as well as ample storage and bench space.
Other features include gas wall heater, single garage and garden shed. With the added bonus of convenience to walk to Waurn Ponds Shopping mecca, Leisurelink, Aldi and seamless access to Epworth, Deakin University and the Ring Road. If you're an investor looking to expand your portfolio, this is the one for you.
Insights: 5/3 Augustine Drive, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 26 other 2 bedroom unit in Highton have recently been sold.

Titled and ready to build on!
Youll love:
Generous proportions with a frontage of over 15m and depth of 35m, planning for your dream home will be easy!
The certificate of title has been issued so this flat allotment is ready to be built on.
Prime coastal location within walking distance to community sporting facilities, secondary college, primary school, child care centre and the Dunes Shopping precinct.
Enjoy the tree lined rural aspect opposite and being able to walk/ride to local beaches.
Plus:
Wetlands, green open spaces, pedestrian and cycle paths are all part of the master plan for this new area.

Description:
SMART LIVING IN BELMONT HIGH ZONE
Smart design combines with sleek clean lines in this four-bedroom home built for contemporary living.
A low-maintenance footprint ensures the double-storey property is ready-made for an executive lifestyle or family on the go.
As a bonus, the home is in the residential zone for Belmont High School, one of Geelongs most in-demand government schools.
You can also leave the car at home to stroll to cafes and shopping at Highton Village a few minutes walk away.
A clever layout sees the master suite, family kitchen, dining and living zone, study nook and laundry on the lower level, while a family living room and three bedrooms occupy the top floor with a central bathroom.
The sleek white kitchen boasts a walk-in pantry, designer tile splashback, island bench with breakfast bar, quality appliances and loads of storage.
The 8m-long adjoining dining/lounge area with feature brick wall and timber floors spills out to a deck and lawn ideal for alfresco entertaining, while the upstairs lounge room enjoys scenic views.
The luxe bathrooms boast floor-to-ceiling designer tiles, frameless walk-in showers and quality fixtures and fittings. A freestanding bath is a feature in the family bathroom.
The master bedroom suite includes a walk-in robe and ensuite, while the other bedrooms have built-in robes.
Other highlights include hydronic heating, split system units, double garage and low-maintenance garden.
The property is also close to highly regarded Clairvaux Catholic and Bellaire primary schools, Christian College, Waurn Ponds shopping, Deakin University, Leisurelink Aquatic Centre and Epworth Hospital.
For commuters, Waurn Ponds and Marshall train stations are a short drive away, as is the Ring Road to Melbourne or towards the Surf Coast.
Insights: 2/25 Sanglen Terrace, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 53 other 4 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Prime Belmont Opportunity Awaits
Opportunities like this are rare.
This is your chance to secure a 776SQM (approx.) corner block in Prime Belmont.
There are endless opportunities for this property, develop, renovate or subdivide (STCA). The original 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom home is currently tenanted for $340pw. Light filled and airy, the property has high ceilings, hardwood floors, 2 living areas a central kitchen along with 3 bedrooms, 2 with BIRS. A central bathroom, separate laundry. There is a verandah at the back of the home, a carport for off street secure parking. Ceiling fans and a gas wall heater.
The true potential is in the land, located on a corner block located within walking distance to everything. There are no easements on the allotment and would be perfect to either redevelop, sub-divide, continue to rent the original home and hold as an investment. The choice is yours! Enquire today to book an inspection - Be Quick!
Insights: 31 Hill St, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 182 other 3 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect first home or investment on 720sqm.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Cam on 0406 597 050.
Please check our Head Office guidelines below before meeting with one of our agents or before viewing a property by appointment.
Visit: https://www.barryplant.com.au/cms/document/view/118/COVID-19_Online_Information_v2.pdf for more information.
Positioned in a sought after established part of Grovedale, close to all amenities. This well-maintained family residence was built meticulously in 1985 and has remained in the same family the entire time and is now ready to satisfy the needs of either first home buyers or investors alike. The home comprises of a spacious light filled living area with main bedroom and ensuite at the front of the home whilst the remaining two bedrooms serviced by a family bathroom zoned at the rear.
The central kitchen incorporates sizeable dining and casual living, leading out onto the north facing back yard. Perfect for the keen renovator, underneath the carpet of lies gorgeous timber floorboards which would look amazing polished up.
This home is complete with a gas heater, air conditioning split system, double carport with drive through access if needed. The spacious backyard enables potential for extension down the track, adding an expansive undercover deck area or even a shed.
Being just minutes from schools, Waurn Ponds Shopping mecca, Epworth Hospital and the Ring Road taking you to Melbourne in under an hour, this property is certainly one not to be missed.
Insights: 65 Moruya Drive, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 143 other 3 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
Hightons Most Exclusive Court
Measuring an enormous 809sqm (approx.) and positioned in riverfalls, Geelongs premier lifestyle estate with million dollar homes and million dollar views. Perfectly located upon the winding rivers of delightful Buckley Falls, this huge allotment offers the very best in prestigious and luxury lifestyle opportunities and is likely the best allotment you can find anywhere in Geelong or the Surfcoast. A wide and spacious court location which includes direct access to master planned parks and walking tracks along the Barwon River. Capturing sweeping uninterrupted views across the river and beyond. Tucked quietly away from the hustle and bustle but still retaining all of the conveniences you would expect of a prestigious development. Close proximity to the Geelong Ring Road positions you perfectly, one-hour drive to Melbourne CBD and 25 minutes to the Surfcoast. Dont miss out on this opportuniyty to build a future for your family at Riverfalls, where the lifestyle is Exceptional by Design

Description:
Huge 891m2 corner block in Old Torquay!
Youll love:
This rare opportunity to purchase a 1970s single-level dwelling thats situated on a huge 891m2 corner allotment in Old Torquay.
The luxury of having the very best of what Torquay has to offer only a moments walk away from your front doorstep.
Glimpses of the ocean & towards Spring Creek from your existing front porch, with the possibility of further development (STCA).
Torquay Front Beach is located at one end of the street, while Spring Creek Reserve is up the other with the Bell St shops & dining precinct just one block away.
Plus:
The original 1970s home is surprisingly well-lit & spacious inside, with original polished timber floors a feature throughout.
It includes 3 well-presented bedrooms, plus a tidy kitchen/meals area that opens onto a large family room.
Theres also a garden shed towards the rear of the property while the distance from the back door to the boundary line spans over 20m.
Corner blocks of this size are few & far between these days in Old Torquay so book your private inspection now, before its too late!

Move In Ready!
Immaculately presented and superbly located, this home should be on top of the list for first home buyers, families and investors alike. Walking distance to the Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Train Station and easy access to the ring road for weekends down the coast or the daily commute to Melbourne. Complete with central heating, split system A/C and remote DLUG with drive through access, also the added bonus of a 3-kilowatt solar system. If you're looking for a complete family home/investment close to schools, shops and ideal for commuters, this one's for you!

Description:
Scandinavian Inspired Beach House
Set in a quiet crescent in the well established Sands Estate, and surrounded by lush greenery, this light and bright double storey home oozes a sense of tranquility, warmth and a natural Scandinavian style.
Enjoy light filled ground floor living with a sunken lounge room featuring a large wood heater, a stunning feature of the home. Open the bi-folds off the dining room and lounge, and extend your lifestyle into the outdoors. The undercover deck is complimented by a spacious and private north facing backyard designed to provide year round utilisation, from gardening to trampoline time. A spacious master bedroom with ensuite and walk in wardrobe are on the ground floor, and feature plantation shutters.
Wander up the floating staircase to the second living area, a further three bedrooms all with robes and a centrally located family bathroom that can be accessed from one of the bedrooms, giving you the option of an upstairs master bedroom. With ceiling fans and sashless windows throughout, economic airflow is easily achieved.
Flexibly designed, with garden views from almost every room, and the sound of waves crashing in the distance at night, this home is sure to become your sanctuary.
What YOU'LL LOVE:
- New kitchen
- Freshly painted inside and out
- Hardwood spotted gum flooring
- Wood Heater in downstairs lounge room
- 2 split systems (upstairs & downstairs)
- Double glazed windows to back of house
- Fully fenced private backyard
- Outdoor shower
- Veggie garden
- Cubby house and sandpit
- Quiet street and neighbourhood
- Short walk to Sands Clubhouse
- Easy level walk to Whites Beach
What the VENDOR LOVES:
"We love the sense of calm of this house, the light filled living spaces and natural stone and wood features. Our crescent is very quiet and peaceful, so even when summer in full swing, we'd never know it. We love easy access to the beach for a run, swim and the various parks within walking distance. In the evenings we love to sit in the upstairs lounge and watch the sunset. But we really love lying in bed at night and listening the waves crash in the distance"
Internal area
222.96m²

Description:
Family Living Doesnt Get Much Better Than This!
When it comes to family-friendly living, it doesnt get much better than this! Occupying approx. 682m2 and boasting a superb entertaining area, this Belmont abode is an absolute gem!
Families will be spoilt for choice with a selection of the regions finest schools only a short distance away. The vibrant hub of High St is also within easy walking distance, providing you with an abundance of cafes, restaurants, and shops. Public transport is conveniently close by, along with sporting grounds.
Offering 4 comfortable bedrooms, study and 2 living areas, the home has also been recently painted throughout. The main bedroom offers BIRs and ensuite while the rest of the bedrooms also include BIR's and share the central bathroom.
The front lounge creates a relaxing ambience while flowing through to the dining/kitchen zone. This area overlooks the family room and is perfect for the large gatherings.
Youll be in comfort all year long thanks to gas heating, split-system A/C and wood heater.
The secure backyard and undercover entertaining area is an absolute treat for the family! With landscaped gardens and established trees surrounding the lush lawn area, outdoor family living is a must. Whether youre hosting a casual barbeque with friends or simply enjoying quality time with your young ones, this outdoor oasis provides the perfect setting.
The double garage offers room for a workshop, while the driveway provides additional off-street parking and ample room for the boat or caravan.
Embrace the family lifestyle youve been dreaming of in Belmont! Inspect ASAP!
Terms: 10% deposit, settlement 60 days.

Description:
Charming, Tranquil and Private
Perfect in design while individually styled with a large flowing floor plan over two levels offering space and comfort throughout thats matched by exceptional outdoor entertaining spaces, this home will makes living an absolute pleasure for any family big or small.
Set in a favorable court location this home is private yet welcoming, positioned amongst the trees with a stunning outlook over Queens Park and surrounding, the home offers four spacious bedrooms, grand size master with walk though robe and full ensuite. The family bathroom is positioned adjacent including bath, shower, vanity and toilet.
Centrally located is the kitchen and dining areas that captures a picturesque backdrop of the rear yard while positioned adjacent is the formal dining and family living room.
The updated kitchen offers electric cooktop stove, dishwasher, ample storage space and breakfast bar.
A second family living room makes for a perfect teenagers getaway/rumpus room or reading quarters offering easy access to the outdoor balcony, completely rebuilt and spanning the full width of the home simply kick back with a wine or two and enjoy the stunning backdrop or evening sunset.
Other features include freshly laid carpet, a spacious laundry/third bathroom with easy external access, split system cooling and feature fireplace giving this home a sense of relaxation and comfort from front to back. Wide single space carport and workshop at the rear to match!
Entertaining family and friends will be an absolute pleasure under your very own outdoor pergola and BBQ area, also offering a generous size back yard (block size 704m2 approx.) and peaceful walk path.
Convenience is key, moments walk from primary and secondary schools, St Josephs & Geelong Collages, bike trails and walking tracks as well as a short drive to Geelong Ring Road and some of the best surf coast beaches in the district, this one wont last long.

Description:
A Place To Call Home!
Dont miss this opportunity to embrace a charming family lifestyle in Highton!
Public transport is a short walk from your front door, along with the Porter Avenue shops that are home to the popular Pane di Matteo bakery. The sporting grounds of McDonald Reserve will inspire the whole family to venture outdoors, while both Highton Village and the Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre are within easy reach. Families will be spoilt for choice with nearby schools including Bellaire P.S, Clairvaux Catholic School, Barwon Valley School, Belmont High School, and the Christian College Campuses.
From the moment you step inside, its easy to see that this one-owner home has been well-loved over the years. Graced with a gas log fireplace, the north-facing lounge creates an enticing setting while flowing through to the kitchen/dining zone. The classic kitchen features a built-in pantry, dishwasher, and cooking appliances inc. a St George electric cooktop. Boasting access to the backyard, the rumpus room is perfect for children and teens who enjoy their own space. Complete with a built-in bar area, this space is also ideal for hosting lively gatherings with loved ones.
All three bedrooms feature built-in robes, while the bathroom, laundry, and powder room complete the layout. Youll be in comfort all year long thanks to a gas wall heater and three split-system air conditioners. The elements are in place for casual outdoor living with the sheltered alfresco flowing onto a paved area that soaks up the sunshine. Gardens line the generous backyard, which provides a beautiful play space for children and pets alike. Ample off-street parking includes a single carport and single garage with ample room for a workshop.
If youre looking for a home to create lasting family memories, then this is the one for you. Enquire today!

Description:
The Perfect Downsizer/Starter/Investment Does Exist!
Positioned in the exclusive Estuary Estate in the heart of Leopold, this contemporary residence is only a few years young and is brimming with loads of quality extras. Offering exceptional value for money, this abode makes an affordable starter, impeccable downsizer or lucrative investment opportunity.
Landscaped gardens welcome you to the home, whereupon stepping inside, modern interiors finished in a neutral palette are revealed. An inviting open plan family and meals area flow effortlessly to the gourmet kitchen. Designed to please the Masterchef within, the kitchen boasts stone benchtops, gas cooking and a walk-in pantry. Fire up the barbie and enjoy Friday night drinks under the covered alfresco area while you watch the kids and pets roam around in the level and fully fenced backyard.
The master suite is a private sanctuary serviced by a his and hers walk through robe and a deluxe ensuite. The remaining two bedrooms share an elegant family bathroom complete with a shower, bath and a separate toilet. The second bedroom features built-in robes whilst the third bedroom has soundproofing and can also be used as a rumpus or home theatre.
Occupying an easy care 400m2 block, other premium features include ducted heating and split system cooling, double lock-up garage with internal access and double-glazed windows.
Estuary Estate is renowned for its sporting fields and clubs, beautiful reserves and walkways. Serviced by public transport, the home is also accessible to the Geelong CBD, Bellarine and local beaches. The home is also moments to local schools and shops with a Bunnings up the road and the Gateway Plaza shopping centre.
Near new, there's nothing left to do but move-in or rent out. Priced to meet the market, this one will sell fast. Call now to arrange an inspection today.

Description:
Prime land in an established Quay locale!
Youll love:
This fantastic 624m2 allotment is in a quality & well-established neighbourhood only minutes from local parks & schools, with easy access to all that Torquay has to offer!
The blocks generous northerly aspect allows for an abundance of natural light & warmth to be incorporated into a dream forever homes design all year round (STCA).
Potential for ocean views from the second storey of your new home.
Plus:
An impressive street frontage of 19m & depth of 34m to work with considerably more than your typical land opportunity found in Torquay.
Take a short walk to Whites Beach and the Dunes Village Shopping Centre.
Other benefits of this quality lifestyle location include the childrens playground, picnic tables & BBQ area plus a dog-friendly footy oval in close proximity at the end of the street.

Description:
A Hamptons Style Home That Will Steal Your Heart
With it's perfect blend of coastal meets luxe, theres so much to love about this gorgeous family home. From it's inviting street presence and tasteful finishes, to the open-plan layout and seamless indoor/outdoor living.
Recently completed and finished to the highest standard, the home offers four bedrooms plus a study and two living areas. Utilising it's North aspect, the main living area is full of natural light and opens onto a protected alfresco area and backyard, perfect for year round enjoyment.
What YOU'LL LOVE:
- Oversized stone island bench and shaker cabinetry
- Feature Carrara Marble herringbone tiled splashback
- Bosch double ovens and 6 burner gas cooktop
- Integrated dishwasher and bins
- Spacious walk in pantry with direct access from garage
- Double glazed windows throughout
- Travertine tiled alfreso area with gas outlet for BBQ
- Gas ducted heating plus split system to main living and master
- Ceiling fans in all bedrooms plus second living area
- Oversized master with impressive walk in robe and ensuite
- Built in robes to bedroom 2, 3 and 4
- Bathrooms tiled to the ceilings with stone bench tops
- 9ft ceilings throughout
- Garden irrigation system and hot/cold outdoor shower
- Home security system with doorbell intercom
- Enviable corner allotment with potential for side access
What The VENDOR LOVES:
We love how light and bright our home is all year round with seamless indoor/outdoor North living. We think our home is in the perfect location, being walking distance to everything we need in Torquay. We love living in such a charming area on the Coast with genuinely amazing neighbours.
Internal area
287.99m²

Description:
Immaculate family home in Grovedale hotspot.
Occupying a corner block, this property presents a terrific opportunity for first homebuyers, families, and tradies alike! Ample off-street parking includes a four-car garage, while the immaculate home features a superb outdoor entertaining area!
From the moment you step inside, you'll love the welcoming ambience that this home exudes. Vinyl plank flooring graces the interiors, which have been beautifully updated over the last few years. The front lounge creates a wealth of space for relaxation, while the open plan living/dining/kitchen zone creates the lively hub of the home. The freshly updated kitchen will delight with a built-in pantry, dishwasher, and stainless steel cooking appliances (oven, electric cooktop, 900mm rangehood). The outdoor entertaining area sets the scene for year-round entertaining. The café-style doors create a fully enclosed setting for the cooler months, while summer will inspire you to open the doors onto the sun-drenched alfresco.
Overlooking the front garden, the Master Bedroom boasts a walk-in robe and en suite. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes are tucked away in a separate wing, along with the main bathroom, separate toilet, and laundry with ample storage.
- Ducted heating and evaporative cooling
- Alarm system with security camera
- Remote lock-up four-car garage with adjoining storage shed
- Secure off-street parking for a large caravan or boat
- Rainwater tank with a pump to the front garden
Located in a family-friendly pocket of Grovedale, this location will leave you wanting nothing. Public transport is footsteps from your front door, while a short stroll will find you at the Waurn Ponds Creek walking trails. Greenville Kindergarten and Mandama P.S are moments away, while a variety of sporting grounds will keep the whole family entertained. Both the Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre and Surf Coast Highway shops are within easy reach, leaving you spoilt for choice with shopping and dining options.
With so much to offer, you'll need to act swiftly to secure this fantastic family abode! Enquire today!
Insights: 1 Langham Court, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 143 other 3 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
Practical and Affordable
Looking for something practical and affordable in an established location? Look no further. Perfectly located behind a high fence creating privacy, this brick home is an opportunity not to be missed. With a spacious living leading into the dining and kitchen area, the renovated kitchen offers ample storage, stainless-steel appliances and dishwasher. Four good sized bedrooms the master with ceiling fan and walk in robe while two of the other bedrooms offer built in robes and all are serviced by the conveniently located renovated bathroom featuring floor to ceiling tiles plus separate toilet. Heading outside the home offers off street parking for three cars while the carport could also double as an undercover entertaining area when required.
Extras include:
- Gas wall heater
- New carpet throughout
- Porcelain tiles
- Established gardens
The home is positioned close to schools, shops and public transport, make your move now as it wont last long.

Description:
Perfect investment Opportunity~lease end April 2021
Here's a great chance to secure this neat&easy care home on a 440 m2 smart block close to all amenities. Offering formal entry with the windows, open living zone with generous meals dining area lead to the well-proportioned kitchen with ample storage room and benchtop. 4 generous bedrooms, 2 with BIRS and 1 accessing to the undercover decking area by sliding door. Large laundry with a separate toilet, middle hall way with a separate bath, shower & vanity. Surrounded by neat and front low-maintained gardens, north facing private backyard and there's room for the pets too. With double carport area with a garden shed behind, there's room for a small boat or trailer which is often hard to find in homes like this. Other features include dishwasher and new painting all rooms, new flooring around living area, gas heating and fans.
It could be perfect for a retired couple looking to downsizing to Grovedale or first home buyers and investors will enjoy the fantastic location close to IGA, ALDI and Marshall Station only minutes away. The Waurn Ponds/Barwon River bike path is close by too, linking the city, Waurn Ponds, Deakin Uni & Epworth Hospital & the Bus service is only meters away. Call today for more information.
